statements: SELECT * FROM market_surveillance_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, ticker_symbol FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy';
SELECT * FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT ticker_symbol, price FROM market_surveillance_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, quantity, price FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM market_surveillance_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, ticker_symbol, price FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date, ticker_symbol, transaction_type FROM market_surveillance_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM market_surveillance_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT ticker_symbol FROM market_surveillance_transactions ORDER BY ticker_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_time, buyer_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT seller_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT entity_name, regulatory_status FROM regulatory_entities WHERE entity_country = 'USA';
SELECT entity_name, entity_country FROM regulatory_entities ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_time, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE buyer_id = 123 AND seller_id = 456;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, regulatory_status FROM regulatory_entities WHERE entity_country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE transaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_entities ORDER BY entity_country ASC, entity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, amount, trader_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, country FROM traders WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, issue_date FROM regulatory_issues WHERE issue_description LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE trader_id = 12345 AND amount < 50000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT t.id, t.timestamp, t.transaction_type, tr.name AS trader_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN traders tr ON t.trader_id = tr.id WHERE tr.country = 'USA';
SELECT t.id, t.timestamp, t.amount, tr.name AS trader_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN traders tr ON t.trader_id = tr.id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ti.id, ti.issue_date, ti.issue_description, tr.name AS trader_name FROM regulatory_issues ti INNER JOIN traders tr ON tr.id IN (SELECT trader_id FROM transactions) ORDER BY ti.issue_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT tr.name AS trader_name, COUNT(t.id) AS total_transactions FROM traders tr LEFT JOIN transactions t ON tr.id = t.trader_id GROUP BY tr.name HAVING COUNT(t.id) > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_surveillance_systems;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM market_surveillance_systems WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM market_transactions WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM market_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy';
SELECT * FROM market_surveillance_systems ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM market_surveillance_systems WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;

SELECT market_participants.participant_name, market_transactions.transaction_date FROM market_participants JOIN market_transactions ON market_participants.participant_id = market_transactions.participant_id;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM market_surveillance_systems;
SELECT * FROM market_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT trader_id, trader_name, country FROM traders ORDER BY trader_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount, product_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, product_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT trader_name, country FROM traders WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY trader_name;
SELECT regulation_name FROM regulations;
SELECT transaction_id, violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY transaction_id;
